value:
*sniff* I'm fine. I just...have something
in my eye... *sniffle*

This hand mirror was my mother's.
She was a cleric, but...when I
was younger...an illness...*sniff*

These are michew berries from my
hometown. They're shiny, sweet,
and a little tart. Want to try?

Grandpa never did join the army. He
said that it wasn't in his nature. It's
not in mine either but...I want to help.

Hmm? Oh, I-I was just restringing my
bow. Grandpa taught me everything
I know about archery, including this...

Are you $Nu?$k$pOh, that's a relief! I was asked to
deliver this to you!

Grandpa used to only take one arrow
with him when he went hunting. I
hope to be that skilled someday...

Well, I might not be the best, but
when something needs to be done...
I do it.

Where'd my mother's hand mirror
go? What? The leather strap! It's torn!
Ohhh... *sniff*... Waaah!
*sniff*... I'm so...so happy!

I'm Neimi... *sniff* Colm says I'm a bit
of a crybaby, but I'll do my very best,
I promise!

Thank you for looking after
me. It's really kind of you,
$Nu.$k$pI've always needed someone to
watch my back, like Colm...though he
doesn't seem happy to do it.$k$pWe grew up together, and I know he
cares for me, but... *sniff* He can be
really blunt sometimes...$k$pBut he did rescue me when I fell into
a river and helped repair Grandpa's
bow when I broke it...$k$pWhen our village was torched by
bandits, he was there, at my side...
*sniff* Oh, I hope they're at peace...$k$pGrandpa and the rest of the villagers
would want me to hold my head up
high. So that's exactly what I'll do!
やっ…
当たって…
きゃああっ…
痛い…
I can do this!
All right, then...
It's going to be OK!
Aim carefully, and...
I'm a klutz. Sorry...
うふふ…
I'm Neimi. I've learned a little of archery. I hope it will be helpful to you.
*yelp* Don't scare me like that! *quails*
I wasn't crying... I just...have something in my eye...
This hand mirror hanging from my waist is a keepsake from my mother. She was a cleric.
I was just restringing my bow. Grandpa taught me how to shoot when I was little.
Thank you, Colm. For then and now... I like you a lot...
Don't go running off into danger alone. I'm worried about you... *sniff*
OK…
What do we do?
Here goes nothing...
